posts.text:
Verð 39.000 Sambærileg vara hér: 
http://www.rotor.is/web/?&OZON=Z3JvdXA9 ... Q9MjUzMw==
1) 2.4GHz wireless A/V transmission 
2) 3.5 inch TFT LCD screen 
3) Waterproof day / night camera 
4) Easy installation for DIY usage 
5) Real-time rear view while back up 
6) License plate wireless camera with wide view angle 
**Camera: 
1) Imaging sensor: 1/4 inch CMOS 
2) Pixels: PAL: 720 x 576; NTSC: 720 x 480 
3) Minimum illumination: 0 lux (IR ON) 
4) Night vision range: 4m 
5) View angle: > 90 degree 
6) Consumption current: IR OFF: 90 – 110mA; IR ON: 120 – 130mA 
7) Power supply: DC 12V 
**Receiver: 
1) 3.5 inch TFT LCD screen 
2) Effective pixels: 960 x 240 
3) Receiving sensitivity: <= -85dBm 
4) Video system: PAL / NTSC 
5) Color configuration: RGB delta 
6) Consumption current: 200mA 
7) Power supply: DC 5V
